title: Flipped Learning-Enhanced Science Inquiry Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and comprehension of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Environment with balanced interaction between self-directed learning using digital devices and face-to-face classes. Operating a personalized feedback system using learner analytics data

learning_goals: Students complete over 80% of pre-learning videos in a flipped learning environment and achieve over 75% on concept comprehension assessments.
Students successfully design and execute science problem-solving processes at least three times through VR-based lab simulations.
Students improve their ability to formulate scientific inquiry hypotheses by at least two levels (on a five-level scale) through peer assessment and discussion activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
